replies.body: Oh man. This makes the Challenger Series even more intense!
Good banter, 10/10 , there are teams in the challenger ladder with ELEVEN WINS.
Looking forward to 'hot girl big tits' to represent OCE in OPL.... or "VB ESPORTS' lmao wtfff
Out of interest, who was the official owner of Rich Gang?
Chenyboy is

Was Chenyboy the owner of RG? Wasn't aware of that...

I knew Stevie Highroller was their manager, I didn't think they really had an assigned owner though.

Either way, all players (including the "owner") are allowed into other league competitions, which would extend to the challenger series. We could see the same crew climb challenger and rejoin the tournament anyway, maybe changing the lineup a little.

With the OPL, all the teams had to make an organisation and have a owner for the team, Chenyboy is the owner, and therefore is permabanned from owning another team

The organisation (including the individual owner) of Rich Gang is indefinitely prohibited from owning another team in the OPL

not sure if he can play or not, or if he will want to play or people will want to play with him
Hmm the comments here in support of a team that is this negative... All HAIL the almighty in game mute button.
bout time... they make oce look bad... oh wait
I'm sure I don't speak for myself in saying that the only reason I watched the OPL was for the RG banter. Shame on you RITO.
The only thing you watched the OPL for was the antics of a bunch of juvenile douchebag fratboys? I don't think Riot are the ones with anything to be ashamed about.
yay goodbye oce publicity!!! gg good oce game
:-( I hurt all over  {{summoner:31}}
hi
gg these tryhards
all of rich gang are a joke anyway, laters nerds
No point in watching OPL now
Then piss off.

If a bunch of dumbasses think they can compete as esports professionals while indiscriminately pissing on the rules and standards clearly set out by the competition organisers, purely on the basis of "THUGLIFEYOLOSWAG", then they officially meet the description of "too dumb to live" and we are all richer for being rid of them. Good riddance to bad rubbish, these losers would never amount to anything anyway.

Dumbest team in esports history. Rot in obscurity, scrubs.
laters pigs
rich gang thugs 4lyf. #gucci boys
